entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
